body:
Well, I am curious if you really managed to write multithreading
scripts, or if you are using multiple shared memory processes ;-)
Anyway, it would be interesting to see them for curiousity. Are you
aware that rpiece can help you distributing rendering of one single
picture, and you can (mis)use ranimate to distribute renderings of
pictures from a view file? These tools already offer a lot, not only
generic process control (no matter if you are on smp, a cluster or a
single cpu), but also error recovery.

CU Lars.
